promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple goat psychic-type pokemon wearing a amethyst crystal headband. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptigoth, a a gigantic simple goat psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Synchronoise, Twinkle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "psychic" or "Cryptigoth". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, goat-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Living in shadowy catacombs, Cryptigoth uses synchronoise to navigate complex tunnels. It twinkles stars at night to communicate.
